Teaching

My curricullum involves digital arts and interactive media, some of my courses’ resources are offered as open source at the following links:

  • Audio Programming using SuperCollider state-of-the-art audio programming platform.

  • Multimedia Design Audio-Visual design and hardware prototyping for interactive installations.

Music experimentations with new media

During 2015-2016 I delivered a series of workshops after receiving a commision by the NPO “Energy for Life Travels” to visit an array of primary and high schools in rural Greece under the aegis of the Republic of Greece and the European Parliament, the destinations are listed below:

  1. 6 April 2016 Evros
  2. 6 April 2016 Dadia
  3. 7 April 2016 Lepti, East Macedonia and Thrace
  4. 8 April 2016 Asproneri, East Macedonia and Thrace
  5. 3 March 2016 Kalpaki, Ioannina
  6. 4 March 2016 Pogoniani, Ioannina
